title: List of cities in Nevada
summary: Nevada is a state located in the Western United States. According to the 2020 United States Census, it is the 33rd most populous state, with 3,104,614 inhabitants,[1] but the 7th largest by land area spanning 109,781.18 square miles (284,332.0Â km2).[2] Nevada is divided into 17 counties and contains 19 incorporated municipalities.[3] Nevada's incorporated municipalities cover only 1% of the state's land mass but are home to 56.7% of its population.[2]
